TextView.android:text: You walk down the path toward the gleam in the distance, but after you come around a hill the gleam disappears and You trudge down the path beating aside grass that has grown up to your waist, and pass a fallen tree that looks like a shattered femur, that looks familiar..., you think to yourself not fully realizing what is happening, eventually you come to a clearing and after you turn left you see a warm glow in the distance. You walk down the path toward the gleam in the distance, but after you come around a hill the gleam disappears and You trudge down the path beating aside grass that has grown up to your waist, and pass a fallen tree that looks like a shattered femur, suddenly you break down, what the hell is going on here you groan to yourself as you realize, you are lost and there is no escape. \nGame Over
